description: The image features a beautifully arranged handmade blue knitted blanket folded neatly on a cozy sofa. The blanket showcases intricate knitting patterns that highlight its softness and warmth. The sofa is adorned with cushions featuring subtle patterns that complement the blanket, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. A softly lit lamp in the background adds an inviting glow, emphasizing the comfort of the blanket. The setting, with light-colored walls and wooden accents, enhances the overall aesthetic appeal of the blanket, making it stand out as the focal point of the advertisement.

captions.background: The background includes a cozy living room setting with a light-colored sofa and warm, inviting decor. The ambiance suggests comfort and style, perfect for showcasing the knitted blanket.
captions.objects: The main object is a handmade blue knitted blanket folded elegantly. Surrounding elements include decorative cushions on the sofa and a soft light emanating from a nearby lamp, creating an inviting scene for potential buyers.
